footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its sacred history, and how it can facilitate deep and lasting healing.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you with wisdom and compassion on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a transformative experience. Find guides on diet and mental preparation.
contactCommunityText: Follow our social media to stay updated on upcoming ceremonies, events, and inspiring content that will help you on your path of healing and spiritual growth. Connect with us and be part of this beautiful family!
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine, a sacred brew prepared from the mixture of two plants: the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub. Used for centuries by indigenous peoples for healing and spiritual purposes, Ayahuasca is a portal to deep introspection, healing, and connection with the universe.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca induces expanded states of consciousness that allow access to the depths of the psyche. During the experience, it is common to have visions, release repressed emotions, and receive profound insights about one's life, behavioral patterns, and existential purpose. It acts as a mirror of the soul, showing what needs to be healed and transformed.
spiritualMasterTitle: The Medicine as a Spiritual Master
spiritualMasterDescription: More than just a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a master spirit. It guides each person uniquely, adapting the experience to their individual needs. With respect and proper guidance, Ayahuasca can be a powerful tool for self-knowledge, overcoming trauma, resolving internal conflicts, and spiritual awakening.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and path. Many find a renewed sense of purpose and direction.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release deep-seated traumas, fears, and emotional blockages. Ayahuasca helps you process and heal past wounds.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a profound connection with yourself, others, and the universe. Feel the unity and love that intertwines us all.
groupCeremonyDescription: Group ceremonies offer a space for collective healing, where the group's energy amplifies the individual experience, creating a powerful field of support and containment.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies tailored to your specific needs and goals, with the exclusive attention of our guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our team is composed of experienced and compassionate facilitators, dedicated to holding a safe and sacred space for your healing journey.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your journey.
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent you a verification email.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a number.
notFoundDescription: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Proper preparation is the key to a profound and transformative experience. Follow these steps to align body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: You register and fill out the medical questionnaire to ensure the experience is safe for you.
ceremonyProcessDescription: You participate in the sacred ritual, guided by our expert facilitators in a safe and supportive environment.
experienceProcessDescription: You navigate your inner world, release emotions, and receive the insights the medicine has for you.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you in applying the lessons learned to your daily life and continuing your growth.
dietSubtitle: Three days before and after the ceremony, we recommend following these guidelines to purify your body and honor the medicine.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Whole grains (rice, quinoa)
• Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
• Grilled chicken or fish (without strong seasonings)
• Plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red and processed meats
• Dairy and fermented products
• Refined sugars and spicy foods
• Caffeine and alcohol
• Sexual relations
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental state and intentions are fundamental to the experience. Here are some recommended practices.
meditationDescription: Dedicate at least 15 minutes a day to meditate, calm your mind, and connect with your breath. This will help you navigate the experience with more serenity.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what brings you to the medicine. What do you wish to heal? What questions do you seek to answer? Write down your intentions to give direction to your journey.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony. It will be a valuable tool for later integration.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can be an intense emotional journey. Prepare to face and release repressed emotions such as sadness, anger, or fear. Trust the process and the wisdom of the medicine to guide you. Allow yourself to be vulnerable in a safe and contained space. Emotional release is a fundamental part of the deep healing that Ayahuasca offers.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: For your comfort and to honor the sacred space, we recommend bringing the following items:
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers)
• Blanket and pillow
• Water bottle
• Tissues
essentialsList:
• A personal item for the altar (optional)
• Notebook and pen for notes
• Open mind and heart
authRequiredJourneyDescription: To access this complete guide, please sign in or create an account. This allows us to provide you with a personalized and safe experience.
questionnairePageSubtitle: Your safety is our priority. Please answer with complete honesty.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDesc: Include heart problems, high blood pressure, kidney issues, etc.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication?
questionnaireMedicationDesc: Include antidepressants (SSRIs, MAOIs), anxiolytics, or any other prescription drugs.
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please specify what medications you are taking:
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions?
questionnaireMentalHealthDesc: Such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis, etc.
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please detail your mental health history:
questionnaireExperience: Have you participated in an Ayahuasca ceremony before?
questionnaireExperienceDesc: Knowing if you have previous experience helps us better understand your process.
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If so, briefly describe your experience:
questionnaireIntentionDesc: Briefly explain what your main intention is or what you seek to heal in this ceremony.
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I seek to heal a past wound, find my purpose, connect with my spirituality...
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save your questionnaire. Please try again.
pleaseCompleteThisStep: Please complete this step to continue.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have finished the questionnaire. You are one step closer to your ceremony. We now recommend exploring the preparation courses to go even deeper.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: These are the answers you provided. If you need to make any changes, please contact an administrator.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not submitted your answers yet.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage the application's content, users, and settings.
userManagementSubtitle: Manage users, their roles, and send communications.
allUsersDescription: View and manage all registered users in the application.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: These are the user's responses to the health questionnaire.
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder:
Hello everyone!

This is a message for the whole community.
invitationTabDescription: Manage WhatsApp message templates to invite users to complete the questionnaire.
newTemplateMessageES: Write your message in Spanish here...
newTemplateMessageEN: Write your message in English here...
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm the change.
emailUpdatedSuccess: Email updated. Please verify your new address.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: We have sent a verification link to your new email.
themeCustomizationDescription: Modify the application colors for light and dark modes. Changes will be applied in real-time.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: To see all our ceremonies and reserve your spot, please sign in or create an account.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies scheduled at this time. Please check back soon.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the ceremony details. Changes will be saved immediately.
addCeremonyDescription: Complete the details to create a new ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. It will permanently delete the ceremony data.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be moved to the past events section and can no longer be booked.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will not be visible to users but can be reactivated later.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: The view, reserve click, and WhatsApp click counters will be reset to zero.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony will now appear in the past events section.
authRequiredDescription: To see the details and reserve for this ceremony, please log in.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past ceremonies.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here you can see the ceremonies you have been assigned to.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: Explore our ceremonies and reserve your spot to begin your healing journey.
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user will have access to.
resetQuestionnaireConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to reset the questionnaire?
resetQuestionnaireConfirmDescription: All of {{name}}'s questionnaire answers will be deleted, and their preparation progress will be reset. This action cannot be undone.
exportDataDescription: Create a full backup of all database collections (users, ceremonies, guides, etc.) to a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON backup file. This action will overwrite all existing data.
importWarningDescription: You are about to overwrite ALL current database data with the contents of the selected file. An automatic backup will be created before importing.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. If something went wrong, you can revert to the previous state.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the data to the state it was in before the last import. Are you sure you want to continue?
rollbackSuccessDescription: Data has been restored to the previous state.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all chatbot conversations with users.
allConversationsDescription: Here you can find a log of all chats.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. I'm here to help you on your healing path. How can I guide you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review technical errors that have occurred in the application to help resolve them.
systemLogsDescription: List of all errors captured by the system.
deleteAllLogsConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete all error logs. Are you sure?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
analyticsDescription: See which sections of the main page get the most interaction.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete all section click data. Are you sure?

editCourseDescription: Modify the details of this course.
deleteCourseConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
coursesDescription: Prepare your mind and spirit for the ceremony with these preparation videos.
noCoursesInCategory: There are no courses in this category at the moment.
authRequiredCoursesDescription: Log in to see the preparation courses for your ceremony.
